body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have a Wall of Denial in play.
2. Cast Oblivion Ring. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Since Wall of Denial has shroud, Oblivion Ring shouldn't be able to target it. It is. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.22.
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: Oblivion Ring will target Wall of Denial

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision ac1c02a439fd .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Oblivion Ring's ability was mistakenly set to be a non-targeted effect. Fixed it.

Thanks!
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/) on February 08, 2012 14:04:34_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have a Wall of Denial in play.
2. Cast Oblivion Ring. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Since Wall of Denial has shroud, Oblivion Ring shouldn't be able to target it. It is. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.22.
